meanings.definition: To spread or smear with a thick substance.
meanings.sent1: She schmeers butter on her toast every morning.
meanings.sent2: I schmeers cream cheese on my bagel for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally schmeers jam on his shirt while making a sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully schmeers paint on the canvas, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully schmeers sauce on the dish, adding flavor to the meal.

meanings.definition: A thick spreadable substance, typically used on bread or bagels.
meanings.sent1: The jar of schmeers was empty, so she couldn't make her sandwich.
meanings.sent2: He bought a variety of schmeers to enjoy with his morning toast.
meanings.sent3: The cat licked the schmeers off the plate when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The bakery offered a selection of delicious schmeers for their customers.
meanings.sent5: The picnic basket was filled with different types of schmeers for the outdoor lunch.
